biocontainers.name: rnacode
biocontainers.summary: Rnacode - analyze the protein coding potential in multiple sequence alignments rnacode relies on evolutionary signatures including synonymous/conservative mutations and conservation of the reading frame. it does not use any species specific sequence characteristics whatsoever and does not use any machine learning techniques.

biotools.summary: Web application for convenient identification of evolutionary conserved protein coding regions.

bioschemas.name: RNAcode
bioschemas.summary: Web application for convenient identification of evolutionary conserved protein coding regions.
